Reviews.Title: Great product-best price
Reviews.Author: Aleksandar Atanasov
Reviews.Content: great product. Absolutely the best price available. All parts were included as described. The best package deal for this product.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Caseym
Reviews.Content: The camera is great! The memory card, battery, tripod are great. on the other hand the memory card reader i got was broke, and the 70-300 lens does not have Image stabilization so i will probably not be using it much, the flash works(sometimes). But the 70D and the 18-135 lens are above and beyond!
